letters:
Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my sincerest apologies for the recent mishandling of the client relationship with [Client's Name]. I deeply regret my actions and the impact they had on our team and the trust placed in us by the client.

I recognize that my oversight led to misunderstandings and may have strained our rapport with them. I take full responsibility for not adhering to the standards we uphold as a team, and I understand the importance of maintaining strong, positive relationships with our clients. 

This experience has been a difficult but necessary lesson for me. I am committed to learning from my mistakes and taking the necessary steps to ensure this does not happen again. I value the trust you and the team place in me, and I am eager to demonstrate my growth moving forward.

Thank you for your understanding and support during this time. I appreciate the opportunity to address this situation and am determined to regain your confidence and that of our client.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
